creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Barbara Porterfield
description: mountain village scene: at bottom, two figures climb up steep steps between large rock formations towards an elevated structure; at center, several buildings elevated on stilts line a cliff; small clearing in the middle and another grouping of small structures and trees at L center; taller mountains in background; details highlighted with light red pigment; small inscription ULC
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Seal, and Label

ULQ: [Tsuchinoto tori shūjitsu sha] (Painted on an autumn day 1789)
markings: ULC, square intaglio; label on L when rolled, in Japanese
title: Mountain Village
